title: Time Rift Anomaly
description: A series of time rifts have opened, causing historical figures and events to mix. The player must restore the timeline and close the rifts.
subquest: Seek the assistance of a renowned historian to understand the time rifts.
Travel to different eras and locate the first time rift.
Solve puzzles and challenges to close the first time rift.
Retrieve historical artifacts scattered throughout time to restore the timeline.
Face off against a powerful entity causing the time rifts.
Use ancient rituals to seal the final time rift and restore order.
